### 瑞士 地圖    ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f2/Civil_Ensign_of_Switzerland.svg){width=10%}
```{r}
library(ggmap)
library(mapproj)
map_1 <- get_map(location = 'Swiss', zoom = 7, language = "zh-TW")
ggmap(map_1)
```

### 瑞士 伯恩位置 經度:7.44744 緯度:46.94809
```{r}
library(ggmap)
library(mapproj)
map <- get_map(location = c(lon = 7.44744, lat = 46.94809),
  zoom = 10, language = "zh-TW")
ggmap(map)
```

> <font color="blue">只要將maptpe改變即可形成各種不同的地圖類型<font>

###  <font color="black">瑞士 伯恩 道路地圖 (1)<font>
```{r}
library(ggmap)
library(mapproj)
map <- get_map(location = c(lon = 7.44744, lat = 46.94809),
  zoom = 10, language = "zh-TW", maptype = "roadmap")
ggmap(map)
```

#### 瑞士 伯恩 道路地圖 (2)
```{r}
library(ggmap)
library(mapproj)
map <- get_map(location = c(lon = 7.44744, lat = 46.94809),
```


#### 瑞士 伯恩 衛星+道路地圖

#### 瑞士 伯恩 黑白地圖
```{r}
library(ggmap)
library(mapproj)
map <- get_map(location = c(lon = 7.44744, lat = 46.94809),
  zoom = 15, language = "zh-TW", maptype = "toner-lite")
```

#### 提亮地圖
```{r}
map <- get_map(location = c(lon = 7.44744, lat = 46.94809),
  zoom = 20, language = "zh-TW")
ggmap(map, darken = c(0.5, "white"))
```

#### 暗化地圖
```{r}
map <- get_map(location = c(lon = 7.44744, lat = 46.94809),
  zoom = 10, language = "zh-TW")
ggmap(map, darken = 0.5)
```
